meanings.definition: The state of having a physical body.
meanings.sent1: The corporeality of the sculpture made it seem almost lifelike.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the corporeality of the rock as I touched its rough surface.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved creating the illusion of corporeality out of thin air.
meanings.sent4: In the world of virtual reality, corporeality takes on a whole new meaning.
meanings.sent5: The corporeality of the ghostly figure sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.sent3: The scientist marveled at the corporeality of the experiment's results.
